meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Katherine Pisarro-Grant Adam Manning Diana Hsu Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7784.

td.p: Katherine Pisarro-Grant, a verbal identity consultant from Brooklyn, New York
Adam Manning, a senior sales manager from Denver, Colorado
Diana Hsu, a legal records assistant from Malden, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,001)

tr.td: WHAT'S THAT ON YOUR HEAD?
PLAYING POLITICS
SAME VOWEL, FRONT & BACK
COMBAT ROCK
PEOPLE OF THE WORLD
IT'S ABOUT TIME
